title: I can’t lift THIS… - Anker 757 PowerHouse
description: Thanks to Anker for sponsoring this video! Enjoy a $100 discount on the Anker 757 PowerHouse with code POWERLTT until June 15th at the Anker store. Learn more about Anker 757 Powerhouse:  or order on anker.com:   Anker started off by making affordable yet quality cables and small battery banks, but they upgraded into something a bit more BEEFIER over the years! The Anker 757 PowerHouse is a literal beefcake in weight but also performance. See why it's so heavy.   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 - Don't do it Linus 0:15 - Unboxing and overview 2:05 - I want to take you apart 2:25 - Battery info 2:52 - An attempt was made 3:15 - Plugging it in 4:15 - More stuff 4:50 - Charge cycle thoughts 5:25 - Anker brand thoughts 5:40 - Even more STUFF! 7:18 - Final thoughts
